events.message: I received my new headphones yesterday, but the left earcup is broken and doesn’t fit properly.
Issue identified as a product defect due to broken component reported by customer.
The ticket has been assigned to a product support agent specialized in hardware issues.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear your headphones arrived damaged. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us a photo of the broken earcup and the packaging it arrived in for verification?
Thanks for the quick reply. I have attached pictures showing the damaged earcup and the box it came in.
We confirm the defect and can offer to send you a replacement unit immediately or provide a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, thank you. Please let me know how soon I can receive it.
Your replacement has been ordered and will ship within 24 hours. You will receive an email with the tracking details shortly.
Just following up to ensure your replacement headphones arrived in good condition and are working properly.
Yes, the new headphones arrived and the defect is completely resolved. Thanks for the great support!
We are closing the case now but please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
